title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "Rousseau and Romanticism" by Irving Babbitt", 1955
medium: Lithography in yellow, grey and black ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically at lower right in script: lustig
Imprinted in grey and black ink across the top: Rousseau and/ Romanticism/ Irving Babbitt
At bottom: MERIDIAN BOOKS published by The Noonday Press/ M3 $1.35
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a yellow background. The title, author and publisher are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover is the title, author and reviews of the book. On both covers, the title uses one large, fancy grey R for both words Rousseau and Romanticism. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "Rousseau and Romanticism" by Irving Babbitt", 1955.
1955. Lithography in yellow, grey and black ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-175.
